faqs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.answer: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers for yearly subscriptions.

faqs.question: Can I cancel anytime?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription anytime from your dashboard settings.

faqs.question: Do you offer discounts for teams?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We offer custom pricing for teams of 5 or more. Contact us for details.

faqs.question: Is there a free trial?
faqs.answer: Yes! Every plan comes with a 7-day free trial. You can cancel before the trial ends to avoid charges.
